Power Modem Service

Version 1.0.0
June 2013

Abstract

This document describes the details of the JNAP protocol to manage WAN configuration for upstream power modem devices.
Copyright Notice
Copyright © 2013 Belkin International, Inc. and/or its affiliates.
All rights reserved.

Change History

Revision Date Notes
2.0.0 2019-07-17 Added PowerModem2 service to indicate the following actions now require authentication:
  • GetDSLSettings
  • GetPowerModemStatus
  • GetSupportedRegions
  • GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus
1.0.8 2013-11-27 SetDSLSettings action changes:
Added result ErrorMissingPCR
Added result ErrorMissingSCR
Added result ErrorMissingAutoDHCP

SetPPPCredentials action changes:
Changed result ErrorInvalidWANType to ErrorUnsupportedWANType
1.0.7 2013-11-15 Added enum ADSLLineStatus

Added action GetADSLLineStatus
1.0.6 2013-10-22 SetDSLSettings action changes:
Renamed result ErrorInvalidQoSType to ErrorUnsupportedQoSType
Added result ErrorUnsupportedModulation

WANType enum changes:
Added enum value Unsupported
1.0.5 2013-10-02 SetDSLSettings action changes:
Removed result ErrorMissingDSLSettings
1.0.4 2013-09-12 Renamed action GetPowerModemDetectionStatus to GetPowerModemStatus

Get/SetDSLSettings action changes:
Added member isPowerModemEnabled
Change member dslSettings from required to optional


Rename struct StaticIPSettings to StaticSettings

Remove action StartPowerModemDetection

Renamed enum Encapsulation to WANType

DSLSettings struct changes:
Renamed member encapsulation to wanType
Changed member wanType type to WANType

Renamed member staticIPSettings to staticSettings
Changed member staticSettings type to StaticSettings

SetDSLSettings action changes:
Added result ErrorMissingDSLSettings
Rename result ErrorUnsupportedEncapsulation to ErrorUnsupportedWANType
Rename result ErrorMissingStaticIPSettings to ErrorMissingStaticSettings
Rename result ErrorSuperflousStaticIPSettings to ErrorSuperflousStaticSettings

SetPPPCredentials action changes:
Rename error ErrorInvalidEncapsulation to ErrorInvalidWANType

GetPowerModemStatus action changes:
Added member supportedWANTypes

GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus action changes:
Renamed member detectedEncapsulation to detectedWANType
Changed member detectedWANType type to WANType
1.0.3 2013-08-06 DSLConfigurationStatus enum changes:
Renamed Unconfigured to NotConfigured

GetDSLSettings action changes:
Removed optional attribute from member dslSettings

Renamed action GetDSLConfigurationStatus to GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus
1.0.2 2013-07-10 Added enum Modulation

Added enum PPPConnectionBehavior

Added enum QoSType

Renamed enum WANType to Encapsulation

Encapsulation enum changes:
Added member 2684Routed
Added member IPoA

Added struct StaticIPSettings

Renamed struct PPPCredentials to PPPSettings

PPPSettings struct changes:
Added member behavior
Added member maxIdleMinutes
Added member reconnectAfterSeconds

DSLSettings struct changes:
Added member autoDHCP
Added member staticIPSettings
Added member qosType
Added member pcr
Added member scr
Added member modulation
Added member mtu
Removed member wanType
Changed member encapsulation type to Encapsulation
Renamed member credentials to pppSettings
Changed member pppSettings type to PPPSettings

GetDSLConfigurationStatus action changes:
Renamed member detectedWANType to detectedEncapsulation
Changed member detectedEncapsulation type to Encapsulation

SetPPPCredentials action changes:
Added member username
Added member password
Added member serviceName
Removed member credentials

SetDSLSettings action changes:
Added result ErrorMissingStaticIPSettings
Added result ErrorSuperflousStaticIPSettings
Added result ErrorInvalidMaxIdleMinutes
Added result ErrorInvalidReconnectAfterSeconds
Added result ErrorInvalidMTU
Added result ErrorInvalidQoSType
Added result ErrorInvalidPCR
Added result ErrorInvalidSCR
Added result ErrorInvalidIPAddress
Added result ErrorInvalidNetworkPrefixLength
Added result ErrorInvalidGateway
Added result ErrorInvalidPrimaryDNSServer
Added result ErrorInvalidSecondaryDNSServer
Added result ErrorInvalidTertiaryDNSServer
Added result ErrorInvalidDomainName
Renamed result ErrorMissingPPPCredentials to ErrorMissingPPPSettings
Renamed result ErrorSuperflousPPPCredentials to ErrorSuperflousPPPSettings
Removed result ErrorUnsupportedWANType
1.0.1 2013-06-24 Renamed action GetAutoDetectionConnectionStatus to GetDSLConfigurationStatus

Renamed action StartAutoConnectionDetection to StartAutoDSLConfiguration

PowerModemDetectionStatus enum changes:
Added: Found, Unknown
Removed: Configured, Unconfigured, Failed

GetDSLConfigurationStatus action changes:
Added: status
Removed: isDetecting

Added enum DSLConfigurationStatus

Removed redundant enum Encapsulation
1.0 2013-06-19

Services

PowerModem

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/PowerModem
This service enables setup of upstream power modem devices.

Service Actions

  • GetADSLLineStatus
  • GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus
  • GetDSLSettings
  • GetPowerModemStatus
  • GetSupportedRegions
  • SetDSLSettings
  • SetPPPCredentials
  • StartAutoDSLConfiguration

PowerModem2

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/PowerModem2
This service enables setup of upstream power modem devices.

Service Actions

  • GetADSLLineStatus
  • GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus
  • GetDSLSettings
  • GetPowerModemStatus
  • GetSupportedRegions
  • SetDSLSettings
  • SetPPPCredentials
  • StartAutoDSLConfiguration

Actions

GetADSLLineStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetADSLLineStatus
This action gets the current status of the upstream power modem's ADSL line.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
status ADSLLineStatus no The ADSL line status.
downDataRateBps long yes The DSL connection's downstream data rate measured in bits per second. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
upDataRateBps long yes The DSL connection's upstream data rate measured in bits per second. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
downOutputPowerdBm int yes The DSL connection's downstream output power measured in decibels for one milliwatt of power. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
upOutputPowerdBm int yes The DSL connection's upstream output power measured in decibels for one milliwatt of power. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
downNoiseMargindB int yes The DSL connection's downstream noise margin measured in decibels. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
upNoiseMargindB int yes The DSL connection's upstream noise margin measured in decibels. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
downAttenuationdB int yes The DSL connection's downstream attenuation measured in decibels. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.
upAttenuationdB int yes The DSL connection's upstream attenuation measured in decibels. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Up.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetADSLLineStatusResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetADSLLineStatus"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "status": "Up",
    "downDataRateBps": 1024000,
    "upDataRateBps": 2048000,
    "downOutputPowerdBm": -20,
    "upOutputPowerdBm": 1,
    "downNoiseMargindB": -10,
    "upNoiseMargindB": 5,
    "downAttenuationdB": -1,
    "upAttenuationdB": 10
  }
}

GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus
This action gets the current status of the auto DSL configuration.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
status DSLConfigurationStatus no The status of the auto DSL configuration.
detectedWANType WANType yes The wan type that the router believes the upstream power modem is currently configured for. This value is only present if the value of the status member is Configured.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatusResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetAutoDSLConfigurationStatus"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "status": "Configured",
    "detectedWANType": "2684Routed"
  }
}

GetDSLSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetDSLSettings
This action gets the upstream power modem's DSL connection settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isPowerModemEnabled bool no Whether the router is enabled to function with an upstream power modem.
dslSettings DSLSettings yes The power modem's current DSL settings.
This structure is only returned if isPowerModemEnabled is true and DSL settings have been automatically configured by StartAutoDSLConfiguration or if they have been manually configured by SetDSLSettings.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetDSLSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetDSLSettings"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "isPowerModemEnabled": true,
    "dslSettings": {
      "wanType": "2684Bridged",
      "multiplexing": "VC",
      "vpi": 0,
      "vci": 36,
      "autoDHCP": true,
      "qosType": "CBR",
      "pcr": 0,
      "scr": 65534,
      "modulation": "MultiMode",
      "mtu": 1492
    }
  }
}

GetPowerModemStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetPowerModemStatus
This action gets the current status of power modem detection.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
supportedWANTypes WANType[] no The list of wan types supported by the power modem
status PowerModemDetectionStatus no The power modem detection status

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetPowerModemStatusResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetPowerModemStatus"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "supportedWANTypes": [
      "2684Bridged"
    ],
    "status": "Found"
  }
}

GetSupportedRegions

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetSupportedRegions
This action gets a list of the supported regions for auto connection detection.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

This action does not have any input parameters.

Output Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
supportedRegions Region[] no The list of supported regions for auto connection detection.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetSupportedRegionsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/GetSupportedRegions"

{
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK",
  "output": {
    "supportedRegions": [
      {
        "name": "Americas",
        "supportedCountries": [
          {
            "name": "Germany",
            "supportedISPs": [
              {
                "name": "Qwest",
                "profileCount": 6
              }
            ]
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

SetDSLSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/SetDSLSettings
This action sets the upstream power modem's DSL connection settings.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
isPowerModemEnabled bool no Whether the router is enabled to function with an upstream power modem.
dslSettings DSLSettings yes The desired DSL settings for the upstream power modem.
Ignored if isPowerModemEnabled is false.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/SetDSLSettingsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidDomainName The specified domainName is not valid.
ErrorInvalidGateway The specified gateway IP address is not valid, is not within the same subnetwork as the ipAddress, or is equal to the ipAddress.
ErrorInvalidIPAddress The specified ipAddress is not valid.
ErrorInvalidMTU The specified mtu is not valid.
ErrorInvalidMaxIdleMinutes The specified maxIdleMinutes is not valid.
ErrorInvalidNetworkPrefixLength The specified networkPrefixLength is not valid.
ErrorInvalidPCR The specified pcr is not valid.
ErrorInvalidPassword The PPP password is not valid.
ErrorInvalidPrimaryDNSServer The specified primaryDNSServer IP address is not valid.
ErrorInvalidReconnectAfterSeconds The specified reconnectAfterSeconds is not valid.
ErrorInvalidSCR The specified scr is not valid.
ErrorInvalidSecondaryDNSServer The specified secondaryDNSServer IP address is not valid.
ErrorInvalidServiceName The PPPoE service name is not valid.
ErrorInvalidTertiaryDNSServer The specified tertiaryDNSServer IP address is not valid.
ErrorInvalidUsername The PPP username is not valid.
ErrorInvalidVCI The specified vci is not valid.
ErrorInvalidVPI The specified vpi is not valid.
ErrorMissingAutoDHCP The wan type was specified as 2684Bridged, but no AutoDHCP value was specified.
ErrorMissingPCR The qos type was specified as CBR or VBR, but no PCR value was specified.
ErrorMissingPPPSettings The wan type was specified as PPPoA/PPPoE, but no PPP settings were specified.
ErrorMissingSCR The qos type was specified as VBR, but no SCR value was specified.
ErrorMissingStaticSettings The wan type was specified as IPoA, 2684Routed or 2684Bridge with auto DHCP, but no static settings were specified.
ErrorSuperflousPPPSettings PPP settings were specified even though the specified wan type was not PPPoA/PPPoE.
ErrorSuperflousStaticSettings Static settings were specified even though the specified wan type was not IPoA, 2684Routed or 2684Bridge with auto DHCP.
ErrorUnsupportedModulation The specified modulation is not valid.
ErrorUnsupportedMultiplexing The specified multiplexing type is not supported by the upstream power modem.
ErrorUnsupportedQoSType The specified qosType is not valid.
ErrorUnsupportedWANType The specified wan type is not supported by the upstream power modem.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/SetDSLSettings"

{
  "isPowerModemEnabled": true,
  "dslSettings": {
    "wanType": "2684Bridged",
    "multiplexing": "VC",
    "vpi": 0,
    "vci": 36,
    "autoDHCP": true,
    "qosType": "CBR",
    "pcr": 0,
    "scr": 65534,
    "modulation": "MultiMode",
    "mtu": 1492
  }
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

SetPPPCredentials

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/SetPPPCredentials
This action configures the PPP credentials. It should be used in conjuction with StartAutoConnectionDetection if a PPP conection is established.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
username string no The username to be used for the connection.
This value must be between 0 and 255 characters.
password string no The password to be used for the connection.
This value must be between 0 and 255 characters.
serviceName string yes The service name to be used for the connection.
This value may not be required for some service providers. This value must be between 0 and 255 characters.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/SetPPPCredentialsResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidPassword The PPP password is not valid.
ErrorInvalidServiceName The PPP service name is not valid.
ErrorInvalidUsername The PPP username is not valid.
ErrorUnsupportedWANType The upstream power modem's wan type is not PPPoA or PPPoE.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/SetPPPCredentials"

{
  "username": "joe",
  "password": "joepassword",
  "serviceName": "joeservice.com"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

StartAutoDSLConfiguration

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/StartAutoDSLConfiguration
This action starts the process of automatically configuring the upstream power modem's DSL connection.

Note:

This action is safe to call within the context of a transaction.

Input Parameters

Name Type Optional Description
region string no The region to use for this auto DSL configuration.
country string no The country to use for this auto DSL configuration.
isp string no The internet service provider to use for this auto DSL configuration.

Output Parameters

This action does not have any output parameters.

Result

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/StartAutoDSLConfigurationResult
Value Description
OK Success.
Error
ErrorInvalidCountry The specified country is not supported given the specified region.
ErrorInvalidISP The specified ISP is not supported given the specified country.
ErrorInvalidRegion The specified region is not supported.
_ErrorAbortedAction
_ErrorInvalidInput
_ErrorInvalidOutput
_ErrorNotReady
_ErrorSessionVerification
_ErrorUnauthorized
_ErrorUnexpected
_ErrorUnknownAction
_ErrorUnknownSession

Sample Transaction

POST [request-uri] HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.1.1
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in request body]
X-JNAP-Action: "http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/StartAutoDSLConfiguration"

{
  "region": "Americas",
  "country": "Canada",
  "isp": "Qwest"
}
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
Content-Length: [number of octets in response body]

{
  "result": "OK"
}

Structures

Country

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/Country
A country used to categorize ISPs.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no The ISP name.
This value is intended to be consumer facing - the appropriate localization should be applied.
supportedISPs ISP[] no The list of supported ISPs for this region.

DSLSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/DSLSettings
The power modem DSL connection settings.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
wanType WANType no The WAN type to be used for the connection.
multiplexing Multiplexing no The multiplexing method to be used for the connection.
vpi int no The virtual path identifier to be used for the connection.
This value must be between 0 and 255.
vci int no The virtual channel identifier to be used for the connection.
This value must be between 0 and 65535.
autoDHCP bool yes Automatically obtain IP settings.
This member is required when the wanType member is 2684Bridged.
staticSettings StaticSettings yes The static settings to be used for the connection.
This structure is required if the value of the wanType member is 2684Routed, IPoA, or 2684Bridged AND the autoDHCP member is false.
pppSettings PPPSettings yes The PPP settings to be used for the connection.
This structure is required if the value of the wanType member is PPPoA or PPPoE.
qosType QoSType no The QoS type.
pcr int yes Peak Cell Rate.
This value must be between 0 and 65534.
A value of 0 (zero) indicates the power modem should choose a reasonable default.
This parameter is required if the value of the qosType member is CBR or VBR.
scr int yes Sustain Cell Rate.
Valid values are between 0 and 65534.
A value of 0 (zero) indicates the power modem should choose a reasonable default.
This parameter is required if the value of the qosType member is VBR.
modulation Modulation no The modulation type to be used for the connection.
mtu int no The desired maximum packet size (maximum transmission unit), in octets, of the power modem's WAN connection. If this value is 0, the power modem will determine the MTU of the WAN connection automatically. Otherwise, the allowed values depend on the specified wan type:
WAN Type Allowed MTU values
2684Bridged 0, 576-1500
2684Routed 0, 576-1500
IPoA 0, 576-1500
PPPoA 0, 576-1492
PPPoE 0, 576-1492

ISP

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/ISP
An Internet service provider.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no The ISP name.
This value is intended to be consumer facing.
profileCount int no The number of profiles this ISP supports.

PPPSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/PPPSettings
The power modem PPP connection settings.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
username string no The username used for the connection.
This value must be between 0 and 255 characters.
password string no The password used for the connection.
This value must be between 0 and 255 characters.
serviceName string yes The service name used for the connection. This value may not be required for some service providers.
This value must be between 0 and 255 characters.
behavior PPPConnectionBehavior no The connection behavior.
maxIdleMinutes int yes The maximum number of minutes that the connection can be idle before it is automatically disconnected.
This value is required if the value of the behavior member is ConnectOnDemand. This value must be between 1 and 9999.
reconnectAfterSeconds int yes The number of seconds to wait before automatically reconnecting after the connection is disconnected.
This value is required if the value of the behavior member is KeepAlive. This value must be between 20 and 180.

Region

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/Region
A geographical region used to categorize countries.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
name string no The region name.
This value is intended to be consumer facing - the appropriate localization should be applied.
supportedCountries Country[] no The list of supported countries in this region.

StaticSettings

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/StaticSettings
The power modem static settings.

Structure Members

Member Name Type Optional Description
ipAddress IPAddress no The host IP address of the router on the WAN.
The following restrictions from RFC 5735 are applied to the WAN host address. The WAN host address must not fall inside the following reserved ranges:
Address Block Description Reference
0.0.0.0/8 "This" Network RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
127.0.0.0/8 Loopback RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
169.254.0.0/16 Link Local RFC 3927
224.0.0.0/4 Multicast RFC 3171
240.0.0.0/4 Reserved for Future Use RFC 1112, Section 4
255.255.255.255/32 Limited Broadcast RFC 919, Section 7  RFC 922, Section 7
192.168.1.0/24: 192.168.1.0 Subnetwork ID RFC 922, Section 7
192.168.1.0/24: 192.168.1.255 Subnetwork Broadcast Address RFC 922, Section 7
networkPrefixLength int no The WAN network prefix length.
This value must be between 8 and 30.
gateway IPAddress no The IP address of the WAN gateway.
The following restrictions from RFC 5735 are applied to the WAN gateway address. The WAN gateway address must not fall inside the following reserved ranges:
Address Block Description Reference
0.0.0.0/8 "This" Network RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
127.0.0.0/8 Loopback RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
169.254.0.0/16 Link Local RFC 3927
224.0.0.0/4 Multicast RFC 3171
240.0.0.0/4 Reserved for Future Use RFC 1112, Section 4
255.255.255.255/32 Limited Broadcast RFC 919, Section 7  RFC 922, Section 7
192.168.1.0/24: 192.168.1.0 Subnetwork ID RFC 922, Section 7
192.168.1.0/24: 192.168.1.255 Subnetwork Broadcast Address RFC 922, Section 7
dnsServer1 IPAddress no The IP address of the primary DNS server.
The following restrictions from RFC 5735 are applied to the primary DNS server address. The primary DNS server address must not fall inside the following reserved ranges:
Address Block Description Reference
0.0.0.0/8 "This" Network RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
127.0.0.0/8 Loopback RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
169.254.0.0/16 Link Local RFC 3927
224.0.0.0/4 Multicast RFC 3171
240.0.0.0/4 Reserved for Future Use RFC 1112, Section 4
255.255.255.255/32 Limited Broadcast RFC 919, Section 7  RFC 922, Section 7
dnsServer2 IPAddress yes The IP address of the secondary DNS server, if any.
The following restrictions from RFC 5735 are applied to the secondary DNS server address. The secondary DNS server address must not fall inside the following reserved ranges:
Address Block Description Reference
0.0.0.0/8 "This" Network RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
127.0.0.0/8 Loopback RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
169.254.0.0/16 Link Local RFC 3927
224.0.0.0/4 Multicast RFC 3171
240.0.0.0/4 Reserved for Future Use RFC 1112, Section 4
255.255.255.255/32 Limited Broadcast RFC 919, Section 7  RFC 922, Section 7
dnsServer3 IPAddress yes The IP address of the tertiary DNS server, if any.
The following restrictions from RFC 5735 are applied to the tertiary DNS server address. The tertiary DNS server address must not fall inside the following reserved ranges:
Address Block Description Reference
0.0.0.0/8 "This" Network RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
127.0.0.0/8 Loopback RFC 1122, Section 3.2.1.3
169.254.0.0/16 Link Local RFC 3927
224.0.0.0/4 Multicast RFC 3171
240.0.0.0/4 Reserved for Future Use RFC 1112, Section 4
255.255.255.255/32 Limited Broadcast RFC 919, Section 7  RFC 922, Section 7
domainName string yes The desired domain name of the router on the WAN.
This must be a valid host name as defined in RFC 952 and RFC 1123. Omitting this value will clear the currently configured domain name.

Enumerations

ADSLLineStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/ADSLLineStatus
Possible statuses of the upstream power modem's ADSL line

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Down The ADSL line is down
Initializing The ADSL line is being initialized
Initialized The ADSL line is initialized
Up The ADSL line is up and operational

DSLConfigurationStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/DSLConfigurationStatus
Possible statuses of the upstream power modem DSL connection.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Configuring The router is configuring the upstream power modem.
Configured The router successfully configured the upstream power modem.
NotConfigured The router has not configured the upstream power modem.
Failed The router failed to configure the upstream power modem.

Modulation

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/Modulation
Types of modulation supported by the power modem. Impacts bandwidth.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
MultiMode Negotiates modulation with host.
T1_413 ANSI T1.413. First ADSL specification, defined in North America only.
G_dmt ITU G.992.1, ADSL1. Almost identical to T1.413, but defined for use worldwide.
G_lite ITU G.992.2. Similar to T1_413 and G_dmt; simpler but less bandwidth.
ADSL2 ITU G.992.3
ADSL2_plus ITU G.992.5
ADSL2_L ITU G.992.3 Annex L
ADSL2_M ITU G.992.5 Annex M
ADSL2_plus_M ITU G.992.5 Annex M

Multiplexing

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/Multiplexing
This service enables setup of upstream power modem devices. Types of multiplexing methods supported by the power modem.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
LLC Logical Link Control.
VC Virtual Circuit Multiplexing (RFC 2684.) Commonly used with PPPoA and PPPoE.

PPPConnectionBehavior

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/PPPConnectionBehavior
Types of connection-maintenance behavior used by PPPoA and PPPoE

Enumeration Values

Value Description
ConnectOnDemand Automatically disconnect after the connection has been idle for a specified amount of time.
KeepAlive Automatically reconnect when the connection is disconnected.

PowerModemDetectionStatus

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/PowerModemDetectionStatus
Possible statuses of the router's power modem detection.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
Detecting The router is in the process of detecting if there is a compatible power modem upstream.
Found The router found a compatible power modem upstream.
NotFound The router was not able to find a compatible power modem upstream.
Unknown The router has not detected if there is a compatible power modem upstream.

QoSType

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/QoSType
QoS types supported by the power modem.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
CBR Continuous bit rate. Requires PCR, SCR is not configurable.
UBR Unspecified bit rate. PCR, SCR are not configurable.
VBR Variable bit rate. Requires PCR, SCR.

WANType

http://linksys.com/jnap/powermodem/WANType
WAN types of supported by the power modem.

Enumeration Values

Value Description
2684Bridged (Replaces RFC1483.) Permanent IP Address to connect to Internet (supports AutoDHCP.)
2684Routed (Replaces RFC1483.) Permanent IP Address to connect to Internet.
IPoA Internet Protocol over ATM. Fixed IP address.
PPPoA Point-to-Point Protocol over ATM (RFC2364.) Requires DSL user name and password.
PPPoE Point-to-Point Protocol over Ethernet (RFC2516.) Like PPPoA, supports optional service name.
Unsupported Used for non-powermodem WANTypes.
